mapper.select: SELECT ID, BOARD_NO, RNUM, RE_RNUM, REPORT_SUBJECT, REPORT_WRITER, REPORT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS REPORT_DATE, REPORT_COUNT, REPORT_HEADER, REPORT_PRIVATE_CHECK, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY RNUM DESC) ROW_NUM, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RE_RNUM DESC) RE_ROW_NUM, REPORT_RE_STEP FROM (SELECT ID, BOARD_NO, REPORT_SUBJECT, REPORT_WRITER, REPORT_CONTENT, REPORT_DATE, REPORT_COUNT, REPORT_HEADER, REPORT_PRIVATE_CHECK, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY REPORT_RE_NO DESC) RNUM, REPORT_RE_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REPORT_RE_STEP DESC) RE_RNUM, REPORT_RE_STEP FROM REPORT ) ORDER BY ROW_NUM DESC, RE_ROW_NUM ASC
